Headline: Temporary Reroute
ShortDescription: #71 buses are rerouted in both directions via Torrance, 100th, and Commercial.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?
Buses are rerouted in both directions via Torrance, 100th, and Commercial. 

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?
Buses are rerouted due to utility maintenance at Commercial/103rd.

Headline: #36 Broadway Temporary Reroute at Broadway/Halsted
ShortDescription: #36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted via Broadway, Halsted, Addison and Broadway: due to, street blockage near Broadway/Halsted.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted via Broadway, Halsted, Addison and Broadway: due to, street blockage near Broadway/Halsted.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Jefferson Park
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Jefferson Park due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Jefferson Park due to police activity. 

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
